question: Companies spend millions each year on advertising online, in magazines and on billboards. These adverts can encourage people to buy goods that they do not really need. What are the positive and negative effects of consumerism?
text: It's irrefutable that only commercial products can get through to the consumers as fast as it goes in this industrial revolution. There are many controversies among folks. I will explain both positive and negative impacts in the forthcoming paragraphs.

The earlier individuals don't pay much attention to buying new things or goods they don't need. They consider it a waste of money. But, people today are attracted to numerous luxurious accessories which can make them amusing or entertaining in their busy lives. That's the only positive feature for manufacturers who know how to advertise their products to draw customers' concentration. They publicize their commercials everywhere in the front sights of the consumers. The most prominent feature is that advertisement has psychological effects on the mind of the people, and they are trying to boost their target revenue for the company's profit. It's an actual challenge in this contemporary business. That's why companies spend millions on advertising to promote their products.
